sn35.243:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
sn35.243:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena kapilavatthavanam sakyanam navam santhagaram acirakaritam hoti anajjhavuttham samanena va brahmanena va kenaci va manussabhutena.
sn35.243:1.3: Atha kho kapilavatthava sakya yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho kapilavatthava sakya bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn35.243:1.4: “idha, bhante, kapilavatthavanam sakyanam navam santhagaram acirakaritam anajjhavuttham samanena va brahmanena va kenaci va manussabhutena.
sn35.243:1.6: Bhagavata pathamam paribhuttam paccha kapilavatthava sakya paribhunjissanti.
sn35.243:1.7: Tadassa kapilavatthavanam sakyanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
sn35.243:2.1: Atha kho kapilavatthava sakya bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena navam santhagaram tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sabbasantharim santhagaram santharitva asanani pannapetva udakamanikam patitthapetva telappadipam aropetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn35.243:2.2: “sabbasantharisanthatam, bhante, santhagaram, asanani pannattani, udakamaniko patitthapito, telappadipo aropito.
sn35.243:2.4: Atha kho bhagava nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena navam santhagaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva pade pakkhaletva santhagaram pavisitva majjhimam thambham nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi.
sn35.243:2.5: Bhikkhusanghopi kho pade pakkhaletva santhagaram pavisitva pacchimam bhittim nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi bhagavantamyeva purakkhatva.
sn35.243:2.6: Kapilavatthava sakya pade pakkhaletva santhagaram pavisitva puratthimam bhittim nissaya pacchimabhimukha nisidimsu bhagavantamyeva purakkhatva.
sn35.243:2.7: Atha kho bhagava kapilavatthave sakye bahudeva rattim dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva uyyojesi:
sn35.243:2.10: “Evam, bhante”ti kho kapilavatthava sakya bhagavato patissutva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamimsu.
sn35.243:3.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkantesu kapilavatthavesu sakyesu ayasmantam mahamoggallanam amantesi:
sn35.243:3.3: Patibhatu tam, moggallana, bhikkhunam dhammi katha.
sn35.243:3.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato paccassosi.
sn35.243:3.7: Atha kho bhagava catuggunam sanghatim pannapetva dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi, pade padam accadhaya, sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva.
sn35.243:3.8: Tatra kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhikkhu amantesi:
sn35.243:3.10: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa paccassosum.
sn35.243:3.13: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn35.243:3.14: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa paccassosum.
sn35.243:4.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva piyarupe rupe adhimuccati, appiyarupe rupe byapajjati, anupatthitakayassati viharati parittacetaso,
sn35.243:4.3: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti …pe…
sn35.243:4.5: manasa dhammam vinnaya piyarupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyarupe dhamme byapajjati, anupatthitakayassati ca viharati parittacetaso,
sn35.243:4.6: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.243:4.7: Ayam vuccati, avuso, bhikkhu avassuto cakkhuvinneyyesu rupesu …pe…
sn35.243:4.10: Evamviharincavuso, bhikkhum cakkhuto cepi nam maro upasankamati labhateva maro otaram, labhati maro arammanam …pe…
sn35.243:4.11: jivhato cepi nam maro upasankamati, labhateva maro otaram, labhati maro arammanam …pe…
sn35.243:4.12: manato cepi nam maro upasankamati, labhateva maro otaram, labhati maro arammanam.
sn35.243:5.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, nalagaram va tinagaram va sukkham kolapam terovassikam.
sn35.243:5.2: Puratthimaya cepi nam disaya puriso adittaya tinukkaya upasankameyya, labhetheva aggi otaram, labhetha aggi arammanam;
sn35.243:5.3: pacchimaya cepi nam disaya puriso adittaya tinukkaya upasankameyya …pe…
sn35.243:5.8: yato kutoci cepi nam puriso adittaya tinukkaya upasankameyya, labhetheva aggi otaram labhetha aggi arammanam.
sn35.243:5.9: Evameva kho, avuso, evamviharim bhikkhum cakkhuto cepi nam maro upasankamati, labhateva maro otaram, labhati maro arammanam …pe…
sn35.243:5.11: manato cepi nam maro upasankamati, labhateva maro otaram, labhati maro arammanam.
sn35.243:5.12: Evamviharincavuso, bhikkhum rupa adhibhamsu, na bhikkhu rupe adhibhosi;
sn35.243:5.13: sadda bhikkhum adhibhamsu, na bhikkhu sadde adhibhosi;
sn35.243:5.14: gandha bhikkhum adhibhamsu, na bhikkhu gandhe adhibhosi;
sn35.243:5.15: rasa bhikkhum adhibhamsu, na bhikkhu rase adhibhosi;
sn35.243:5.16: photthabba bhikkhum adhibhamsu, na bhikkhu photthabbe adhibhosi;
sn35.243:5.17: dhamma bhikkhum adhibhamsu, na bhikkhu dhamme adhibhosi.
sn35.243:5.18: Ayam vuccatavuso, bhikkhu rupadhibhuto, saddadhibhuto, gandhadhibhuto, rasadhibhuto, photthabbadhibhuto, dhammadhibhuto, adhibhuto, anadhibhu, adhibhamsu nam papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
sn35.243:6.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva piyarupe rupe nadhimuccati, appiyarupe rupe na byapajjati, upatthitakayassati ca viharati appamanacetaso,
sn35.243:6.3: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti …pe…
sn35.243:6.5: manasa dhammam vinnaya piyarupe dhamme nadhimuccati, appiyarupe dhamme na byapajjati, upatthitakayassati ca viharati appamanacetaso,
sn35.243:6.6: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.243:6.7: Ayam vuccatavuso, bhikkhu anavassuto cakkhuvinneyyesu rupesu …pe…
sn35.243:6.9: Evamviharincavuso, bhikkhum cakkhuto cepi nam maro upasankamati, neva labhati maro otaram, na labhati maro arammanam …pe…
sn35.243:6.11: manato cepi nam maro upasankamati, neva labhati maro otaram, na labhati maro arammanam.
sn35.243:7.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, kutagaram va sala va bahalamattika addavalepana.
sn35.243:7.2: Puratthimaya cepi nam disaya puriso adittaya tinukkaya upasankameyya, neva labhetha aggi otaram, na labhetha aggi arammanam …pe…
sn35.243:7.8: yato kutoci cepi nam puriso adittaya tinukkaya upasankameyya, neva labhetha aggi otaram, na labhetha aggi arammanam.
sn35.243:7.9: Evameva kho, avuso, evamviharim bhikkhum cakkhuto cepi nam maro upasankamati, neva labhati maro otaram, na labhati maro arammanam …pe…
sn35.243:7.10: manato cepi nam maro upasankamati, neva labhati maro otaram, na labhati maro arammanam.
sn35.243:7.11: Evamvihari cavuso, bhikkhu rupe adhibhosi, na rupa bhikkhum adhibhamsu;
sn35.243:7.12: sadde bhikkhu adhibhosi, na sadda bhikkhum adhibhamsu;
sn35.243:7.13: gandhe bhikkhu adhibhosi, na gandha bhikkhum adhibhamsu;
sn35.243:7.14: rase bhikkhu adhibhosi, na rasa bhikkhum adhibhamsu;
sn35.243:7.15: photthabbe bhikkhu adhibhosi, na photthabba bhikkhum adhibhamsu;
sn35.243:7.16: dhamme bhikkhu adhibhosi, na dhamma bhikkhum adhibhamsu.
sn35.243:7.17: Ayam vuccatavuso, bhikkhu rupadhibhu, saddadhibhu, gandhadhibhu, rasadhibhu, photthabbadhibhu, dhammadhibhu, adhibhu, anadhibhuto, adhibhosi te papake akusale dhamme sankilesike ponobhavike sadare dukkhavipake ayatim jatijaramaraniye.
sn35.243:8.1: Atha kho bhagava utthahitva ayasmantam mahamoggallanam amantesi:
sn35.243:8.3: Sadhu kho tvam, moggallana, bhikkhunam avassutapariyayanca anavassutapariyayanca abhasi”ti.
sn35.243:9.3: Attamana te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa bhasitam abhinandunti.
